author: Karyn Rusin
text: Despite my concerns about ordering from StockX our son reassured us the product would be authenticated and as it was only $100 or so cheaper than ordering from the official Lego store we placed our order (assuming any knockoff would be hundreds of dollars cheaper). Upon delivery our 13 year old son could immediately see the "authenticated" Millennium Star Wars lego set we had purchased for his birthday was fake - not a single lego "logo" on any of the pieces, instructions marked "Star Plan" instead of "Star Wars" and packets not labelled. It has taken weeks, many emails, photos from us etc. just to get StockX to agree to take it back and give us a refund - and only after we purchased the "same" set directly from the official Lego store and could "prove" to StockX what they had sent was fake. Their courier has failed to collect their product today - and they won't give us a refund until they have their product back. Don't deal with this company under any circumstances.
title: Lego FAKE

author: Stevie
text: I inadvertently ordered two pairs of shoes from Stockx and need to return one pair. I tried to make contact thru email and by phone several times but there was no response. For this reason, I’m hesitant to place anymore orders going forward.
title: I inadvertently ordered two pairs of…

title: Shoes look  used ,worn

author: G N
text:
unfortunately a very bad buying experience. The order status of the shoe was not changed for 3 weeks. After contacting StockX, they said that the shoe is currently on a small delay and gave me a 20€ voucher for my next purchase. I then asked again if the shoe would come at all or if I should rather cancel it and buy it again. I was assured that the shoe arrives 100%. After 1 week (a total of 4 1/2 weeks after ordering) the purchase was canceled. 
Then I was sent an email that the shoe is not sent, reason "
Due to this setback, outside StockX" and I was again given he said 20€ voucher. 

Waiting over a month, being assured several times that the shoe will come 100% (while the price continues to rise).
Will not complain unnecessarily, but the next time I think 2 times whether I really want to buy a sneaker through stockX
title: unfortunately a very bad buying…

author: NNay
text: I never got my package:( I am so sad and upset. It was literally my last dollar I spent on this gift.

title: I bought a ps5 for basically the base…

author: Max
text:
Order 35772889-35672648.

When I opened the box I noticed an extraordinary amount of glue on the right shoe. The left shoe had StockX and Nike labels, while the right one did not. 

I thought about contacting support about the lousy quality of the right shoe. But after reading about the company’s support experience, I realized that it is not likely that my concern will be addressed. So I figured that I can go with those glue stains even though they were way too bad for a factory defect. So even though I had a suspicion that one of the shoes was fake, I kept them. 

I removed the tags. After I had worn shoes once for an hour, my suspicions that one shoe is fake got solid. There was disproportionate leather wear on the right shoe. After one walk it was too much. So now I am confident that StockX sent me the original left shoe and the counterfeit right one. 

I feel that this company will not help me with this situation for a couple of reasons. One, is I got to shoes one week after they were delivered. I was out of the house for a spring break, but StockX does not care since they leave only three business days for concerns. Two, I removed the StockX tag. It does not change the situation at all since the tag was only attached to the left shoe, which I have no concerns about. Three, their reputation for resolving issues suffers. 

I will probably never wear these shoes. I am disappointed that I have wasted $200 on something that does not meet not my expectations but fundamental integrity. 

I contacted support about this but do not expect my issue to be resolved. I have a friend running the sneaker youtube channel. I will get to him with this story if StockX does not provide an adequate solution by the end of the week. I am sure that people deserve to know how this company runs the business.
title: That was my first and probably the last experience with StockX.
